appDesc.message: Instantly turn formatted content into AI-ready Markdown.

popupSubtitle.message: Turn formatted content into Markdown for AI tools.

openEditorAria.message: Open editor in a new tab
openEditorAria.description: Aria label for opening the editor

clearAria.description: Aria label for the clear button

notifyMarkdownDetected.message: Markdown detected. Edit using the top right button.

notifyNoRichText.description: The summary message for missing formatted text

notifyNoRichTextDetails.message: Only plain text found. Copy formatted content (like tables) first.
notifyNoRichTextDetails.description: Detailed error message when only plain text is found

notifyAlreadyConverted.description: Notification when text might already be markdown

notifyNoTextDetails.message: Clipboard is empty. Copy some content first.
notifyNoTextDetails.description: Detailed error message when clipboard is empty

welcomeIntroEmpty.message: You've opened the editor directly. You can write Markdown or paste content here.
welcomeIntroEmpty.description: Intro text when editor is empty

welcomeIntroContent.message: Your clipboard content has been successfully converted to Markdown.
welcomeIntroContent.description: Intro text when content is present

welcomeEditorModesIntro.message: Use the toggle buttons in the toolbar to switch views:

modeRichTextAlt.description: Alt text for Rich Text mode icon

modeDiffAlt.description: Alt text for Diff mode icon

modeMarkdownAlt.description: Alt text for Markdown mode icon

welcomePersistencePart1.message: Content is saved to your browser's

welcomePersistencePart3.message: . It will be cleared when you close the tab or browser.

welcomePoweredByPrefix.description: Prefix for the powered by link
